title.rendered: eCommerce risk management – 6 Ways To Reduce Risk in Business

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 42:30 — 38.9MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

Podcast (10k-podcast): Play in new window | Download (Duration: 42:30 — 38.9MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | TuneIn | RSS

Job #1 for any business owner is – to keep your business alive & thriving. Part of that responsibility is to avoid – or at least reduce – risks. In this episode, we’ll share 6 ways smart business owners are doing just that.

You will learn

  • 6 ways to reduce ecommerce business risk
  • What you need to measure in your finances
  • The missing money measurement  physical product sellers need
  • The main issue with debt – and it’s not just having it!
  • The alternatives to loans that you may not know exist
  • The secret source of cash in your business
  • Why your professional advisors may not be up to scratch – and what to do about it
  • The missing professional in many e-commerce sellers’ lives
  • The difference between a coach and a mentor
